Title: Farewell, For Now
Description:
Our destinies are forever intertwined. There are events taking place that are reshaping our world and ultimately will destroy it. We must put an end to them before it is too late.

Know that you can always count on me, $g brother : sister;! We will meet again on the larger island. May you find peace until then, $n.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Sassy Hardwrench at the Wild Overlook on the Lost Isles.
RewardText:
Wow, oh wow! Is that who I think it is?

You rescued Thrall, Warchief of the Horde?!!!

<Sassy $g gives you an appraising look : looks envious of you;.>

Well, let's see about getting over to that larger island. I sure as heck don't want to swim the strait with all of those sharks down there.
